# RSA4
> `-`

## About the Challenge
We were given a file that contain 3 modulus, public exponent, and 3 ciphertexts

```
n1 = 

e1 = 3

c1 = 

================================================

n2 = 

e2 = 3

c2 = 

================================================

n3 = 

e3 = 3

c3 = 
```

## How to Solve?
In this case im using [X-RSA](https://github.com/X-Vector/X-RSA) to recover the plaintext, and because then choose the 6th option
